description:
En route to their Fearnix showdown, Chup and crew encounter a pair of annoying monsters called Will ‘n’ Wisp. The disturbing duo launches an esteem-crushing roast of our heroes. Afterward, the Fearnix marks Pigsy as its next prey. Pigsy recalls her traumatic time at Sultan Vinegar’s Distillery, but she soon proves that you can’t keep a good pig down.
Source: crunchyroll
